channel.title: [Delta]wow huge problem rofl[delta]
channel.description:
rofl just outa nowhere on the server CMD this shows over and over real fast. [code]java.lang.NullPointerException at client.getHit(client.java:1733) at client.GetBlockAnim(client.java:2845) at NPCHandler.AttackPlayer(NPCHandler.java:1671) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:2411) at process.run(process.java:25) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
idk whys its saying that, just outa knowwhere it says that, and then my server dc's. any idea's whats wrong or how to fix? :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: [Delta]wow huge problem rofl[delta]
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

Lets see what Sun has documented for us regarding NullPointerException(s):

Thrown when an application attempts to use null in a case where an object is required. These include:

Calling the instance method of a null object.
Accessing or modifying the field of a null object.
Taking the length of null as if it were an array.
Accessing or modifying the slots of null as if it were an array.
Throwing null as if it were a Throwable value.

okay so now we know what we are dealing with. We know the error, but where is it occuring?
at client.getHit(client.java:1733)
at client.GetBlockAnim(client.java:2845)
at NPCHandler.AttackPlayer(NPCHandler.java:1671)
at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:2411)
at process.run(process.java:25)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

^There. The cmd has given you a stack tracing the problem, check out each line and interpret the code to see where the logic falls. Especially if you’ve recently changed something on one of these lines.

Read full topic
